field.name: ulid
field.label: Menu HTML tag ID
field.description: A unique tag ID used for the menu as it appears in the template page source. Only the {xm} tags within this container will be processed. MUltiple containers can be separated by comma.

field.name: keepdropline
field.label: Keep drop lines
field.description: If enabled, droplines will be visible in the page title, breadcrumbs menus etc.
